title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 263.7 - City of Yonkers earnings tax returns for decedents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 263.7 - City of Yonkers earnings tax returns for decedents

State Regulations

Tax Law, § 8(c) of § 1340(c); Codes and Ordinances of the

City of Yonkers, § 92-105(c)

In general, the same rules for filing City of Yonkers
earnings tax returns apply to a nonresident decedent as in the case of any
other nonresident taxpayer. The executor or administrator of the estate of a
taxpayer who died during the taxable year, or any other person charged with the
property of such a decedent, must make and file a City of Yonkers earnings tax
return for such decedent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
263.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
